title: T-2 and T-3 zone in the Regional Plan shall be treated as Residential Zone and all provisions of UDCPR shall be applicable
clause_text: T-2 and T-3 zone in the Regional Plan shall be treated as Residential Zone and all provisions of UDCPR shall be applicable. However, height of building shall not exceed
